de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Class CardSystemMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CardSystemMonitor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardConnectionMonitor

    public class CardSystemMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitors a ICardSystem's ICardTerminal and ICard instances and dispatches all events to an CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener. Dispatching is using a single, dedicated thread to ensure event ordering.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener
      A callback interface for events generated by the CardSystemMonitor.
